post.title: Next
post.body: - https://nextjs.org/learn/foundations/about-nextjs ### next/image - https://nextjs.org/docs/messages/sharp-missing-in-production - https://www.npmjs.com/package/sharp - https://www.npmjs.com/package/@squoosh/lib ### SEO - https://nextjs.org/learn/seo/introduction-to-seo （TODO） - https://github.com/garmeeh/next-seo - https://nextjs.org/docs/advanced-features/measuring-performance next-seo images 参数是一个数组，大部分情况都是使用最后一张作为封面。如果需要特定图片作为封面可只设置一张。 - https://github.com/xiaotiandada/blog/issues/107 seo 部分可以参考 ### PWA - https://github.com/shadowwalker/next-pwa - https://lavas-project.github.io/pwa-book/chapter06/1-manifest-json.html - https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/Progressive_web_apps/Add_to_home_screen > Tip: Put the viewport head meta tag into _app.js rather than in _document.js if you need it. - https://github.com/shadowwalker/next-pwa/issues/99 ### Layout - https://nextjs.org/docs/basic-features/layouts - https://github.com/vercel/next.js/tree/canary/examples/layout-component - https://adamwathan.me/2019/10/17/persistent-layout-patterns-in-nextjs/ ### Vercel λ (Server) server-side renders at runtime (uses getInitialProps or getServerSideProps) ○ (Static) automatically rendered as static HTML (uses no initial props) ● (SSG) automatically generated as static HTML + JSON (uses getStaticProps) >Error: No more than 12 Serverless Functions can be added to a Deployment on the Hobby plan. Create a team (Pro plan) to deploy more. Learn More: https://vercel.link/function-count-limit ### SharedArrayBuffer - https://nextjs.org/docs/advanced-features/security-headers 父级开启了 ```js [ { key: 'Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy', value: 'require-corp', }, { key: 'Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy', value: 'same-origin', }, ] ``` iframe 源也开启了会被拒绝链接
post.html:
• https://nextjs.org/learn/foundations/about-nextjs

next/image

  • https://nextjs.org/docs/messages/sharp-missing-in-production
  • https://www.npmjs.com/package/sharp
  • https://www.npmjs.com/package/@squoosh/lib

SEO

  • https://nextjs.org/learn/seo/introduction-to-seo （TODO）
  • https://github.com/garmeeh/next-seo
  • https://nextjs.org/docs/advanced-features/measuring-performance

next-seo images 参数是一个数组，大部分情况都是使用最后一张作为封面。如果需要特定图片作为封面可只设置一张。

  • https://github.com/xiaotiandada/blog/issues/107 seo 部分可以参考

PWA

  • https://github.com/shadowwalker/next-pwa
  • https://lavas-project.github.io/pwa-book/chapter06/1-manifest-json.html
  • https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/Progressive_web_apps/Add_to_home_screen

Tip: Put the viewport head meta tag into _app.js rather than in _document.js if you need it.

  • https://github.com/shadowwalker/next-pwa/issues/99

Layout

  • https://nextjs.org/docs/basic-features/layouts
  • https://github.com/vercel/next.js/tree/canary/examples/layout-component
  • https://adamwathan.me/2019/10/17/persistent-layout-patterns-in-nextjs/

Vercel

λ (Server) server-side renders at runtime (uses getInitialProps or getServerSideProps) ○ (Static) automatically rendered as static HTML (uses no initial props) ● (SSG) automatically generated as static HTML + JSON (uses getStaticProps)

Error: No more than 12 Serverless Functions can be added to a Deployment on the Hobby plan. Create a team (Pro plan) to deploy more. Learn More: https://vercel.link/function-count-limit

SharedArrayBuffer

  • https://nextjs.org/docs/advanced-features/security-headers

父级开启了

[
  {
    key: 'Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy',
    value: 'require-corp',
  },
  {
    key: 'Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy',
    value: 'same-origin',
  },
]

iframe 源也开启了会被拒绝链接
